title.narrative: Road Network Development Project I ( Bala Murghab to Leman)

description.narrative: The Project will help complete the improvements to the national ring road by constructing a 143 km section from Laman to Bala Murghab.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: a. Higher level of mobility and increase in freight volumes and passenger transport services. b. Increased reliability and level of service on section of regional road network in northern Afghanistan.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Increase in the number of registered bus operators from 165 in 2007 to 400 in 2022.

description.narrative: a. Higher level of mobility and increase in freight volumes and passenger transport services. b. Increased reliability and level of service on section of regional road network in northern Afghanistan.

title.narrative: Response time to emergency road failures and blockades of ADB-financed roads lowered from 18 months to 3 months by 2022.

description.narrative: a. Higher level of mobility and increase in freight volumes and passenger transport services. b. Increased reliability and level of service on section of regional road network in northern Afghanistan.

title.narrative: Increase in average journey speed on the project roads from 35 km/h to 50 km/h 2022.

description.narrative: a. Higher level of mobility and increase in freight volumes and passenger transport services. b. Increased reliability and level of service on section of regional road network in northern Afghanistan.

title.narrative: Increase in the number of registered goods vehicle operations from 400 in 2007 to 600 by 2022.

description.narrative: a. Higher level of mobility and increase in freight volumes and passenger transport services. b. Increased reliability and level of service on section of regional road network in northern Afghanistan.

title.narrative: Winter travel on at least 1,000km of regional roads is undisrupted.
